Sentencas: A noble integration of a cascade refrigeration system with a two-stage compression chiller is proposed.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The compression and the absorption systems have a cascade inter-cooler/evaporator, and the compression system has two compressors working in series.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The compressors can be either reciprocating or screw type.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: This system runs by a driving unit which can be a micro-turbine or a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The system components are modeled and analyzed through the energy and exergy approaches.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The performance parameters of the systems and the second law efficiency are calculated in different operating conditions.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The results show that the maximum irreversibilities happen in the generator and the first-stage compressor, and the total destruction is higher when a micro-gas turbine is used as the prime mover.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: It appears that by using reciprocating compressors, energy and exergy are consumed up to 260% and 188% more efficiently in the proposed system compared to a traditional single-stage compression refrigeration system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The two latter parameters would be 53.7% and 29.2% in case of using screw compressors.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: Practical application: So much of our lives rely on refrigeration, from the food that we eat to the transportation and processing of vital resources.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: Industrial refrigeration systems such as gas compression, oil and gas processing, petrochemicals, power generation, carbon capture and food processing and storage are dependent on low-temperature refrigeration systems.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: Multi-stage refrigeration cycle is a conventional approach to provide low temperature for industrial processes.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The proposed cascade system can reduce the energy consumption of a two-stage refrigeration system, using the waste heat from an industrial process.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system

Sentencas: The first and second law analysis of the proposed system approves the upgrade in energy and exergy efficiencies of this system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of a two-stage cascade refrigeration system
